body:
### Teatime
This is a macruby based command line application that flashes your screen at least 4 times (but you can specify what you want) when your tea has finished steeping...

Currently you have to install MacRuby, but eventually I'll bundle it with the executable so that you don't have too fool with this..
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
name: Teatime
